titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 268) setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1989, 1990, and 1991.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-524.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/22/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Con. Res. 268 (congressional budget).
